solution_line_template: The boat had {total_sheep} - {sheep_drowned} = <<{total_sheep}-{sheep_drowned}={sheep_to_shore}>>{sheep_to_shore} sheep make it to shore.
{total_cows} cows on the boat - {cows_drowned} drowned = <<{total_cows}-{cows_drowned}={cows_to_shore}>>{cows_to_shore} cows made it to the shore.
{sheep_to_shore} sheep + {cows_to_shore} cows + {total_dogs} dogs = <<{sheep_to_shore}+{cows_to_shore}+{total_dogs}={total_to_shore}>>{total_to_shore} animals made it to shore.
